resources.string: What\'s the best product from last Monday\'s event?

Looking at reviews, low-rise? That's the best response and that table
You said it was the most fun, right???

I heard that low rise is the trend this year, so I want to try it, but I am skinny.
I'm so curious about whether it would look good on people who don't
If there are pops that have been there, please share a review of how it was~~!
